member.name: INewShortcutHookW.GetExtension
member.summary: Gets the file name extension for the shortcut object.
member.param: Pointer to a string that receives the extension.
The size of the buffer at pszExtension, in characters.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INewShortcutHookW.GetFolder
member.summary: Gets the folder name for the shortcut object.
member.param: The address of a character buffer that receives the folder name.
The size of the buffer at pszFolder, in characters.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, S_FALSE if no folder has been assigned, or a standard error code otherwise.

member.name: INewShortcutHookW.GetName
member.summary: Gets the file name of the shortcut object, without the extension.
member.param: A pointer to a string that receives the name.
The size of the buffer at pszName, in characters.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INewShortcutHookW.GetReferent
member.summary: Gets the referent of the shortcut object.
member.param: A pointer to a string that receives the referent.
The size of the buffer at pszReferent, in characters.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INewShortcutHookW.SetFolder
member.summary: Sets the folder name for the shortcut object.

param.name: pcszFolder
param.para: A pointer to a string that contains the folder name.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INewShortcutHookW.SetReferent
member.summary: Sets the referent of the shortcut object.
member.param: TBD
TBD

param.name: hWnd
param.para: A handle to the window that will be used as the parent if the object needs to display a message box or dialog box. This value can be NULL.
A pointer to a string that contains the referent.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.summary: Sets the referent of the shortcut object.

A pointer to a string that contains the referent.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
